dict.string: Your explanation for why the app needs access to calendars

Our app will only access your device\'s location in the background when you initiate a check-in or check-out time only. When the Employee check-out from the application, then location access of the device will be stop. Your location data will not be shared with third parties.

This background location access is solely for the purpose of providing accurate check-in and check-out data and ensuring the efficiency of our servic. Your location data will be used only for purposes directly related to improving your experience with our app and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
